ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Site Set out as per construction plan provided with GPS location and 3D model provided by designers. Site set out inspected with designers/MSQA and client ensure criteria is acceptable.
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All signs to looking in excellent condition. Signs to have good reflection and visibility. NO scratches or markings. All signs to match with construction drawings provided by designers.
3 - Pole, Impact recovery post and Ground Socket
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Check for underground service before installtion. All poles and post to be looking in excellent conditon with end caps - 3m long. Ground socket to be 60mm dia, 600mm deep with grouted screw or pins. For Black and white pole 76mm dia and 600mm deep
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The dug out hole to be 300mm wide and 600mm deep. 20Mpa concrete with 50mm cover at bottom to be used for installing socket. The sockets to have 50mm reveal at top and smooth finish of concrete around the socket.
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All poles to inserted into the socket after the concrete curing. And, the screw or pins to be used to prevent thr pole rotation.
○ The impact recovery post installed on the island infill surface after curing period by drilling and using Dyna bolts. The bolts are tightned sufficent to prevent rotation
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All the sign/Belisha disk to be fixed with the pole or post with ARC brackets and tightened adequately.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: As built drawings and Ramm Sheets Completed

name: METHODS OR REFERENCE: Issued for Construction Drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Setout Pipe Alignment and catchpit locations and with inlet & outlet points and inverts as required to construct to design
METHODS OR REFERENCE: Drawings and Dockets
Check for freshly formed pipes and return if required
2) All Concrete RCRRJ pipes to be fitted with Rubber rings
3) Pipes shall have product certification (ISO Type 5) to AS/NZS 4058
4) Prefabricated concrete Manhole/cesspit shall be in accordance with TDM Standards/SWCOP
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards - RD0010
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Subsoil pipe should have punched holes and filtersok
○ Depth to be 375mm from subgrade level to invert of pipe or as possible to achieve invert of subsoil pipe to be above soffit level of outlet pipe in the downsteam cesspit.
○ Backfilled with scoria 30/10 or similar approved product.
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards - RD0025, RD0026, RD0027 and SWCoP - drawing SW05 revision 2
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: No Damage or cracks- Material should compliance with TDM standard
METHODS OR REFERENCE: as per supplier (busck) guidelines
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: No Damage or cracks- Material should compliance with TDM standard
FREQUENCY: Daily / as trenching takes place. Different depth methodology

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure the trench is cut in such a manner that the SW pipe will be laid true to the depths, grades and lines shown on the drawing. provide a minimum of 100mm bedding below each pipe
VERIFICATION ACTIVITY: Bedding for Concrete Pipe Laying & Manhole & Cesspit
METHODS OR REFERENCE: Placing and compaction of Bedding Material.
FREQUENCY: Inspected continuously during placing and compaction of Bedding Material.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Bedding & Pipe surround material to be GAP7 or GAP 20 or alternate material
○ TDM Technical Standard RD0010, RD0025, RD0026, & RD0027 & SWCoP - drawing SW05 revision 2, to be followed
RECORDS: Visual Inspection, Photos showing depths of trench and trench reinstatement, Clegg Sheet
VERIFICATION ACTIVITY: Trench Backfill - Placing & Compacting
METHODS OR REFERENCE: Placing and compacting of Trench Backfill Material
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Backfill shall be placed in layers less than 200 mm thick. Compacted backfill material to be free of Lumps > 150mm
○ TDM Technical Standard RD0010, RD0025, RD0026, & RD0027 & SWCoP - drawing SW05 revision 2, to be followed
METHODS OR REFERENCE: Trench, install, bedding and backfill
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Depth to be 375mm from subgrade level to invert of pipe or as possible to achieve invert of subsoil pipe to be above soffit level of outlet pipe in the downsteam cesspit.
○ Backfilled with scoria 30/10 or similar approved product.
RECORDS: Visual Inspection, Photos showing depths of trench and trench reinstatement

name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Site Set out as per construction plan provided with GPS location and 2D model provided by designers. Site set out inspected with designers/MSQA and client ensure criterea is acceptable.
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards - KC0001, KC0030, KC0031
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Kerb & Channel to be laid using precast hand-laid on compacted minimum 300mm GAP65 sub base with CIV > 25. Concrete 20MPa @28 Days
RECORDS: Clegg Sheet, photos. Concrete Plant Docket
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards - KC0001

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Channels must be laid to flow water in the direction of the nearest cesspit in a manner such that no water ponds and match new road level. Channel grade to follow long-sections provided in IFC set.
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards - FP0001
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Basecourse - 100mm Gap40 min. thickness
○ Clegg CIV > 12 (frequency every 3m or minimum 4 spots per pour - excluding PX)
○ Surfacing - Concrete 100mm and 20 MPa @ 28 days. 4kg/m3 black oxide with broom finish
RECORDS: Clegg Sheet, photos. Concrete Plant Docket
METHODS OR REFERENCE: AT Contract Specification 14000
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Service covers to be adjusted to new surface levels. Ensure no damage is done to street furniture in the vicinity while carrying out works.
METHODS OR REFERENCE: ATCOP Section 12 Footpaths and Pedestrian Facilities
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 100mm thick layer of compacted approved quality topsoil, free of weeds and stones and sowed with grass seeds.
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards - FE0012
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 150mm post and 2500 spacing connected with chains.
○ Post 600mm inground with 75mm thick around and 150 thick at top collar with rebar.
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TES Design drawing RD-001 REVA
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: 150mm x 50mm H5 Timber Blocking
